name: sebc-dev-marketplace
description: Marketplace de plugins Claude Code pour developpeurs. Skills, commands et workflows pour le developpement web et l'ecriture technique.

plugins.name: scd-astro
plugins.description: Skill Astro 5.x on Cloudflare Workers/Pages. Rendering modes, Content Layer, Cloudflare bindings, breaking-change prevention.

plugins.name: scd-writer
plugins.description: Workflow d'ecriture en 7 phases pour developpeur-auteur. L'humain ecrit et pense, Claude questionne, structure et polit. Ne genere jamais de contenu a la place de l'auteur.

plugins.name: scd-forge
plugins.description: Architectural design patterns for Claude Code plugins. Component selection, context budget architecture, multi-component orchestration, and quality validation. Complements plugin-dev with holistic design guidance.

plugins.name: scd-svelte
plugins.description: Skill Svelte 5 + SvelteKit 2. Runes, components, routing, data loading, state management, hooks, TypeScript, testing, deployment, ecosystem selection, anti-pattern prevention. Complements the Svelte MCP server.

plugins.name: scd-tauri
plugins.description: Skill Tauri v2 desktop and mobile. Architecture, security (capabilities, permissions, scopes, CSP), IPC bridge (commands, events, channels, state), plugin ecosystem (30+ official), desktop patterns (multi-window, tray, menus, sidecars), mobile (Android, iOS), build pipeline, code signing, updater, CI/CD, testing. Uses WebFetch for official docs lookup.

plugins.name: scd-review
plugins.description: Interactive guided code review on the current branch. Reviews file by file in optimal order with JSON-based progress tracking, jq-optimized state updates, and cross-platform design.
